column1: Uchi////Their sushi options are always fresh and creative
column3: and their kitchen menu is also tasty and foodie-approved. They also have a great happy hour menu
column4: though the line starts before the open so you should try and make a reservation. I can't list out everything I've eaten
column5: because there's too many and I have a bad memory
column6: but almost everything I've had has been superb. Make sure you save room for dessert too
